Coala.description: Static code analysis using Coala. Requires 'pip3 install coala-bears'

Control Your Tabs.description: switch between document tabs using Ctrl+Tab / Ctrl+Shift+Tab (most recently used order or tabbar order) and Ctrl+PageUp / Ctrl+PageDown (tabbar order)

Zen Coding.description: High-speed HTML, XML, XSL (or any other structured code format) coding and editing. The core of this plugin is a powerful abbreviation engine which allows you to expand expressions - similar to CSS selectors - into HTML code.

Macropy.description: Allows you to record and execute macros.

Whitespace Remover.description: Drops unnecessary whitespaces on file saving.

Focus Auto Save.description: Save documents when the window looses focus.

Favorites.description: Add a feature for favorite documents.

Reflow.description: Automatically format paragraphs using gedit margin width. Similar to emacs <alt>-q command.

Gitedit.description: Simple git workflow support in a console tab. Requires GitPython.

Gedi.description: Python auto completion with jedi. Requires 'jedi' pip module.
